entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
